main event: On July 2, 1964, an unidentified object was reported sighted in Dayton, Ohio, with a bright flash and noise, moving across the sky.
interesting points: The object passed close to the horizon at an elevation of 30-40 degrees, resembling an echo but moving much faster., A witness observed two UFO objects hovering in the sky at 0300 on July 17, 1964., One report describes the object as having a brilliant white color and no sound., Multiple instances of UFO sightings were reported around Dayton during this period, indicating a possible pattern of activity., The reports were part of Project Blue Book, documenting unidentified aerial phenomena.
witnesses: Mrs. (name redacted) and others from various reports
